examples: What is the history of AAiT?
responses: Addis Ababa Institute of Technology (AAiT) is one of the leading technology institutions in Ethiopia. It was established in 1956 with the help of the United States as part of a bilateral agreement. AAiT has a rich history of providing high-quality education and contributing to technological advancements in the country.

examples: Who played a role in founding AAiT?
responses: AAiT was founded with the support of the U.S. government under the Point Four Program. It was initially established as part of the Haile Selassie I University and has since evolved into an independent institution known for its excellence in technology and engineering education.

examples: How has AAiT evolved over the years?
responses: Over the years, AAiT has seen significant growth and development. It has expanded its academic programs, research initiatives, and collaborations with international institutions. It has also established itself as a leader in technology education in Ethiopia.
